reg_info.act_under: Liquor Control Board of Ontario Act, 2019

content.content: 1. The aggregate amount of all expenditures in respect of a capital project constitutes a major capital expenditure for the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection 12 (4) of the Act if the aggregate amount of the budgeted or actual expenditures of the LCBO for the capital project exceeds $10 million.
content.raw_html: 1. The aggregate amount of all expenditures in respect of a capital project constitutes a major capital expenditure for the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection 12 (4) of the Act if the aggregate amount of the budgeted or actual expenditures of the LCBO for the capital project exceeds $10 million.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
